bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Nodejs at the moment is built with default intl flags, which means it has no internationalization support at all.
It should be built with --with-intl=system-icu
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): nodejs-4.4.7-2.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: node -e "Intl"
Actual results: ReferenceError: Intl is not defined
Expected results: nothing
